name: CHS73 50th Reunion - Dinner
location: Drury Inn, 3351 Percy Drive, Cape Girardeau, MO 63701
description:
Hors d’oeurves, a cash bar and a time to remember!

- Hors d’oeurves + cash bar
- Discounted room rate of $148/night for Sept. 15 & 16 (includes free breakfast + evening drinks & snacks)
- Call 1-800-325-0720 before August 28, 2023 and use Group number 10018741 to make your reservation

No charge for Veterans & their companions
